About Me

Who I am...

BIO

My name is Richard Wilson, a Full Stack Web Developer. I development websites and web applications using various programming languages and technologies. Being exposed to the endless possibilities that software developement entails has been a large motivating factor for me. Constantly pushing me to improve myself and find new and innovative solutions for building software.

Fullstack Web Developer

I have built and deployed applications from scratch. From the planning and designing phase to creating the backend and frontend of the application.

Backend Developer

I have experience writing server side code in several different programming languages. I have worked with backend frameworks such as Express, Laravel and Django

Programmer

I have written scripts with different programming languages and worked with SQL and NoSql databases. Through working on various projects I have developed expertise in working with tools such as git and the command line.
